name: Life is a..RUN!
description:
This game is my contribution to the UDC Gamejam #18, the theme is "One Life".

Controls:

Left arrow or A key = Go left. Right arrow or D key = Go right. Spacebar = Jump (only from age 3 and up).

The game idea:

In this game you only have one life, and the game itself takes you through a whole life from a crawling child to being a very old person that eventually dies from age. 

Gameplay is a three lane infinite runner, you need to avoid the obstacles, and the holes. Everything kills you except the red elixir of youth potions, those add 10 seconds to your life. 

At the start of the game you have 180 seconds until you die from age at 90 years old (if my math is correct) but by finding the potions you can get alot older.

Have fun!

/Emil
